mapper.select: select title, writer, artist, toonday, toonBg, toonvideo, toontype, keyword1, keyword2, keyword3, story1, story2, toonend, totalgood, totalview from webtoon join (select (select distinct title from episodegoodview where title=#{title}) as title, (select count(*) from episodegoodview where episodegood='T' and title=#{title}) as totalgood, (select count(*) from episodegoodview where episodeview='T' and title=#{title}) as totalview from dual) using (title)
select episodecode, episode, title, thumbnail, to_char(updatetime, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as updateTime , free from episodelist where title=#{title} order by episodeCode desc
